name: Magic Slug
description:
Magic Slug - Beta version 0.2

Find powerups and try to defeat the Big Slime in this pre-release demo of our Metroidvania MAGIC SLUG.

You don't need every powerup to defeat the Big Slime, but it sure helps!

WASD to move

Space to jump - Powerup unlocks

Left Click to attack - Powerup unlocks

Right Click for special attack - Powerup unlocks
